key_risks: High debt levels and financial vulnerability with a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.24
Exposure to the declining retail sector, impacting occupancy rates and rental income
Sensitivity to market volatility, including real estate and interest rate fluctuations
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging misleading investors about business prospects between July 2022 and May 2024
Historical dependence on Sears Holdings, which has downsized operations
governance_issues: Legal scrutiny from the class-action lawsuit potentially damaging investor confidence
